    @Deprecated
public class InertiaEllipsoid
extends RegionAnalyzer3D<Ellipsoid>
    Compute parameters of inertia ellipsoids from 3D binary / label images.
    Author:
    dlegland

      • inertiaEllipsoids

        public static final Ellipsoid[] inertiaEllipsoids(ij.ImageStack image,
                                                  int[] labels,
                                                  ij.measure.Calibration calib)
        Deprecated. 
        Computes inertia ellipsoid of each region in the input 3D label image.
        Parameters:
        image - the input image containing label of particles
        labels - the array of labels within the image
        calib - the calibration of the image
        Returns:
        an array of Ellipsoid instances representing the calibrated coordinates of the inertia ellipsoid of each region
